TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SendPacketsElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 陣列中的元素。

span.span: Represents an element in a array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來增強供伺服器使用非同步網路 I/O 達到最高效能的應用程式使用的類別。The class is used to enhance the class for use by server applications that use asynchronous network I/O to achieve the highest performance. 類別會搭配屬性來取得或設定資料緩衝區或檔案傳送使用方法。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method.

threadsafe.span: 此類別的執行個體都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Instances of this class are thread safe.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的新執行個體檔案名稱的檔案中的類別。The constructor initializes a new instance of the class with a filename of a file. 類別會搭配屬性來取得或設定資料緩衝區或檔案傳送使用方法。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method. 支援通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑`filepath`參數。Universal Naming Convention (UNC) paths are supported by the `filepath` parameter. 如果檔案是目前的工作目錄中，就必須指定沒有路徑資訊。If the file is in the current working directory, no path information needs to be specified.

param.name: offset
param.span: 位移 (以位元組為單位)，從 的開頭到 中的位置 ( 參數中指定開始傳送資料的位置)。

param.name: endOfPacket
param.span: 布林值，指定這個元素是否要和下一個元素合併於通訊端層對傳輸提出的同一個傳送要求中。

span.span: A Boolean value that specifies that this element should not be combined with the next element in a single send request from the sockets layer to the transport.

param.span: 這個旗標可用來更精細地控制資料包上或訊息導向通訊端上每個訊息的內容。

span.span: This flag is used for granular control of the content of each message on a datagram or message-oriented socket.

summary.span: 使用指定的緩衝區、緩衝區位移和計數，並指定是否要將此元素和下一個元素合併於通訊端層對傳輸提出的同一個傳送要求中，來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified buffer, buffer offset, and count with an option to combine this element with the next element in a single send request from the sockets layer to the transport.
